name: The Ceramic Uncertainty
description:
"The Ceramic Uncertainty was the most fun I ever had reading about a plant." -Jay is Games

Version 1.1 is live!

Save your game!

Use a bookmark! (see save your game)

Cringe at even fewer errors!

An adventure full of curious mysteries and bizarre life commentary!

-40,000+ words! According to Wikipedia that's the minimum qualifications to consider a body of text a novel!

-80+ unique plot resolutions.

-An underlying theme across hundreds of choices and dozens of drastically differing decision trees.

-Runs in your web browser of choice (PC & limited mobile support).*

-It was written by one person in less than a year!

*this is the intended way for the game to work. If you are having issues running the game in any form, contact us IMMEDIATELY!

Play without downloading ANYTHING in your browser at Philome.la

OR visit http://crazyknuckles.com

Doesn't make a huge difference ;)
